reviews.review:
Portál 2  je jedna z nejhezčích a nejzapeklitějších her co sem hrál. Skvělá atmosféra, velmy dobrý příběch, zábava pro přátele apod. Hru pro jenoho hráče sem hrál v celku dlouho a vůbec toho nelituju bavylo mě to, ano párkrát sem se trochu zasekl ale stačí trochu logicky zapřemýšlet a jeto, okkolí je opravdu hezké le i nebezpečné. Když se před vámi oběví roboti tak je bud´ opatrně obejdete nebo tam vlítnete, chytnetejej a rozmlátíte vše okolo sebe ( můj způsob hry ).Vyvrcholení sem tak trochu tušil ale tak to bylo super.
Portál 2 je úžasně provedená a logická hra, při jejím hraní sem se opravdu bavyl a proto ji dávám 10/10 bodů.
Doporučuji

i completly love this game its got me started on my pc gameing but on my portal gun it doent show the little light when i shoot a portal please help if any one knows how to fix this please let me know

Беру из своего хранилища оценок обзор для двух частей Portal:

Интерестная логическая игра. Пока - самая лучшая, в которую я играл (сейчас - на ровне с The Talos Principle). Ты - Чел, то есть испытуемая, которая тестирует порталы и, наверное, их влияние на организм. Всё и по началу шло опасно но потом глЭдос зашла слишком далеко - она пустила в ход турелей. Конец мне понравился как и в первой, так и во второй части. В первой он смешной, а во второй - интригующий.
Текстуры: 6/10 8/10
Сюжет: 5/5 +1
Логика: 5/5 5/5 +1
Музыка: 3/5
Интерестность: 5/10 9/10
Итого: 7,4/10 {+0,4} 8,6/10 {+0,8}

Общий итог для Portal 2: 9,4/10. Выше пяти, значит, рекомендую
Play this in singleplayer... nice. Play this in coop... even better.

Захожу в Тестовые камеры сообщества - Сыграть в одиночные камеры - Быстрая игра - С наивысшим рейтингом. Грузится - грузится, но не чего не происходит. Раньше всё работало. Подскажите, что делать.
First game I have ever played and it's my all time favourite !
Portal has to be the best Puzzle game i have come across i beat in a short amount of time and it was Overall great.

Portal 2 is the follow on to the extremely successful first person original. The game retains all of the game play elements from Portal 1 and adds lots of new features such as bridges made from light beams, and splashing paint gel which accelerate your speed or make you jump higher. 

In the single player campaign, you play as Chell. As with the original Portal, your character can take a small amount of damage before they die, thankfully like the original you don't take fall damage still. The aim of the story mode is to explorer the Aperture Science Lab, which is filled of complex puzzles that have a clear exit point, but there are also other parts of the game which are not so clear leaving the objects less clear.

The tutorial at the start of the game explains all of the game play elements very well and gets you well prepared for the on coming puzzles; and whenever there is a new element introduced, the game does a very good job of making you aware what it does without shoving a tutorial screen in your face every time.

Portal 2 is powered by the Source engine, like all of Valve's more recent releases (Half Life 2, Left 4 Dead, TF2), and it looks stunning. You will find it hard nowadays to find a game that looks as well polished as Portal 2, all of the colours, textures and visual effects are done perfectly. 

Story-wise is the feature in Portal 1 that I thought it fell down on, however in Portal 2 they knocked it out of the park. It follows on from the story line set in the original and goes beyond the level of detail and complexity that you would expect. I needed to find out how it ended once I started playing, and the ending is just beautifully crafted. 

The difficulty is like most puzzle games, if you are good at them, it will just come naturally. It definitely has a better difficulty curve when compared to the original, but even still at times I had to revert to a walkthrough to pass through some puzzles (shame on me eh?) but there is nothing here that can't be solved if you sit and think for a couple of minutes each time.

The single player story mode took me about seven hours to complete, this to me is a perfect length for a game of this type, the game ends at a high point and I was 100% satisfied with the outcome. There is also a co-op campaign included which will also add a good number of hours. On top of both of these, we also have Steam Worksho

I have always wanted a portal gun in real life, and thank you for the coop finally.

Portal 2 levou o gênero de puzzle a outro nível. Jogo espetacular, viciante e desafiante. Depois que você começa a jogar é difícil escolher em qual fase você vai dar uma pausa.
Merece muito mais uma continuação no futuro.

This game continues the story of the original game in the (very) distant future. Story continues to be loosely woven into the Half Life universe, although the events of Half Life are now in the (very) distant past.

A few extra characters join the two main characters from the original game, and each one makes important contributions to the story. There are a lot of tests to solve, lots of history to explore, and plenty of pre-recorded messages to listen to. While the game has a serious tone, the dialogue is absolutely hilarious.

This is a much longer game than the original. There are a wide variety of different (but often familiar) environments that you must navigate to move the story along. Game play flows smoothly from one chapter to the next, and the experiences is extremely satisfying. There are some fun twists and surprises. All along the way the story, test chambers and other game environments are all very nicely knit together.

If you enjoyed the original Portal, you will love this sequel.

(This review is only for the single-player campaign. There are also multiplayer co-op courses that appear to be just as engaging and full of content as the main game: not just nice add-ons!)

重新写一遍评测，这次缩短大量文本。
《portal2》是我见过游戏中玩法最独特的，给人的印象十分深刻，让人几乎忘不了它。
游戏里的所有东西都很讲究，无论是故事的合理性，提示的方式，谜题难易度的把握，完成谜题的成就感，这些都是在同类型游戏里很难做好的。画面优秀，手感优秀，带创意工坊功能。或者说这是一个动作解谜游戏？我几乎没有理由不给它满分。

它可以说这是我玩的最棒的解谜游戏了，整个游戏单人时长7小时左右，但是剧情在合作里有延伸，所以再加上玩通合作模式的剧情应该整个游戏是12小时左右了。

[h1]10/10[/h1]-无与伦比，我玩过最强的作品。
Fun puzzle game that's pretty unique. Interesting mechanics and fun co-op. Nice story, and good player-made puzzles. I replay it, but there is no replay value.

Obra, maestra, no tengo palabras para describirlo.

Es cómico, pero se toma en serio a si mismo, creando una historia enrevesada, divertida, graciosa y espectacular.

El gameplay es perfecto, las mecánicas no se repiten, aparecen nuevas cada pocos niveles, y siempre te acaba sorpendiendo, la escala de dificultad es perfecta, desde cámaras fáciles hasta enrevesadas salas preparadas para romperte el coco.

Los personajes de este juego son LEGENDARIOS, daría 1000 protagonistas de cualquier otro videojuego por una simple torreta de este. Tenemos a Glados, una autómata psícopata fría y controladora, a Wheatley, que fue creado para contraarrestar a Glados, siendo creado para puramente, ser un cretino, y aún con esta promesa es un personaje muy carismático, luego tenemos a los cores, que bueno, aparecen en la batalla final, pero aún así son increíbles.

Róbale el dinero a tu abuela, atraca un banco, rapta a un niño rico, fóllate a una vieja con dinero, ve a la puta oficina de Obama y pídele 10 euros, PERO COMPRÁLO.

Y LO MEJOR DE TODO, PAGA AHORA Y DALE TODO TU PUTO DINERO A GABEN.

In letzter Zeit wurde auch Portal und Portal 2 ab und zu mal wieder angefasst und zwar nicht ohne Grund. Die Story in Portal 2 ist lustig gestaltet und auch das ein oder andere geile Easter Egg kann man finden, hat wieder mal mega Spaß gemacht!
Auch der Multiplayer ist klasse, allerdings sind meiner Meinung nach die meisten Testkammern dort nicht wirklich anspruchsvoll, weshalb ich jedem emfehlen kann, einfach mal ein paar Community-Testkammern zu spielen. Die die ich davon bis jetzt gespielt habe waren echt gut und man musste endlich mal ein bisschen nachdenken und zusammen arbeiten um zu einem Ergebnis zu kommen :D

Великолепная и неповторимая игра! Головоломки, заставляющие по настоящему включать мозги, уморительный сюжет (причём даже в кооп сюжет вплетён и очень даже не плохо), замечательное музыкальное сопровождение и картинка радующая глаз! Впрочем, всё как всегда у Valve, одна из лучших игр ever!
